channel.title: Changelog on Dread's Skyrim Build
channel.description: Recent content in Changelog on Dread's Skyrim Build

item.title: Guide changelog
item.description: 2021-08-10 Updated Preparations Updated BethINI settings Updated arguments for Textgen and DynDOLOD Foundation DynDOLOD Resources Updated to v3. Please note that the url has changed. Majestic Mountains Updated install instructions Gameplay Blade and Blunt Changed install instructions to include Blade and Blunt - Timed Block Module. More Craftable Equipment Updated install instructions Character Appearance Calienteâ€™s Beautiful Bodies Enhancer -CBBE- Added note - CBBE is no longer recommended CBBE Presets Compendium Added note.

item.title: Patches changelog
item.description: 2021-07-11 Patches updated, removed patches for removed mods 2021-06-27 Updated patches to the latest Adamant/Mundus/Aetherius 2021-06-23 Some patches updated with small changes. Many patches moved to the new mod Animated Heavy Armory. 2021-06-04 Patches updated to support DAR version of Animated Armoury.
